group_1.narration: "Shall I tell you about the time right@after I first met Yachiyo?"

group_1.textLeft: 'But', 'Even', 'It's impossible for me'?
I'm jealous of how you can conveniently@escape your responsibilities like that.

group_1.textRight: And what is it that you know…?!

group_1.textLeft: I don't know anything about crybabies like you!

group_1.narration: "I met Yacchan by chance during my first Witch hunt,@but we didn't become friends right away."
"Yacchan was often annoyed with me@since I cried all the time…"
"...I wasn't very composed back then,@so I must've been really immature."
"*Giggle* It's the same for me as well."
"That's why I used to make Yacchan@appear in my dreams."

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry, let's keep our composure!

group_1.textRight: …Y-yeah.

group_1.textLeft: Don't be nervous.
You have Magical☆Mifuyu by your side!
Come on, let's do it together!

group_1.textRight: W-wow! We managed to beat it!

group_1.textLeft: Right? I told you it would be okay, didn't I?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Thank you, Miss!
Will you continue to fight with me@from now on?

group_1.textLeft: Of course!
Magical☆Mifuyu is a friend to all in need!
The Yacchan in your dreams…@I don't know, it just doesn't feel right…

group_1.textRight: At the time I didn't even know her name.
I barely knew anything, so I had to fill@in the gaps with my imagination…

group_1.textLeft: Ha, I shouldn't laugh…but…it's so wrong…@I-I'm sorry…
You shouldn't hold yourself back@if you want to laugh.
When I first heard this story, I laughed, too.@I couldn't even be mad.

group_1.textRight: AHAHAHA!

group_1.textLeft: But you're pushing it, Felicia.

group_1.textRight: I-I can't stop!@Pfft, haha!

group_1.textLeft: You don't have to laugh at it so much!

group_1.textRight: But they're like totally different people!
At the time I wanted to be friends with@the Magical Girl who I didn't get along with.
I wanted to become someone she could@depend on…

group_1.textLeft: I see, so that was your ideal?

group_1.textRight: Yes.
When I was young, my dream world was@my ideal reality.
I hoped that as I got older, I would grow@to have that freedom in the real world.
That was the image I had in mind@for my future.

group_1.textLeft: So that was your "dream".@The perfect version that you could become.

group_1.textRight: Exactly, it was the "dream" version of me!

group_1.textLeft: It must be nice… Having a version of yourself@that you want to be…
I can't picture that for myself at all…
Seriously?!
Wouldn't you want to jump into the world@of Decagon Ball?

group_1.textRight: I think that's more your thing.

group_1.textLeft: But if you could have whatever dreams@you wanted…
That means you could recreate fictional@worlds too, right?
I'd want to have adventures in the world@of Decagon Ball!

group_1.textRight: Hmm, I wonder if that's also an ideal world,@in a way…?
*Giggle* You're exactly right.
In a sense, it's the world you'd want@to experience if you were totally free.

group_1.textLeft: Then I bet you must've gone on lots@of adventures!

group_1.textRight: …No. In the beginning I was only using@my dreams as a safety blanket.
I don't need my dreams for comfort anymore.

group_1.textCenter: *Giggle* In a dream, I can be whoever I want@to be…
Because in my dreams, I'm free.
